name: The Marketplace Project
description: A basic (mock) e-commerce website that features user authorization, product listings, filtering/sorting, shopping carts, and order processing.

name: Boring Weather App
description: My very first React Native app. A minimalist mobile application that fetches and parses current weather, air quality, and weather forecast data from OpenWeatherMap.org’s API services into a user-friendly interface.

name: Blueprint Thing
description: A blueprinting application for planning and drawing building schematics for voxel-based video games such as Enshrouded and Minecraft. Currently near the “almost completed” MVP/proof-of-concept stage.

name: Text-Based RPG Engine
description: My coding bootcamp capstone project. An engine for text-driven Role Playing Games, conceptually inspired by the idea of Zork (1977). The engine is driven by the presence of keywords in the player's responses to the game's prompts. I may be rebuilding and finishing this one in the near future.
